title: Starfield Steam Numbers Are Already Astronomic - Kinda Funny Games Daily 09.01.23
description:
Don’t miss One Piece on Netflix on August 31.

Go to http://rocketmoney.com/kindafunny to cancel your unwanted subscriptions with Rocket Money.

Time Stamps:
00:00:00 - Start
00:04:12 - Housekeeping
As a reminder: Our Starfield review is up right now featuring our lead reviewer Parris Lilly. Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames
Speaking of Starfield, we got a Starfield marathon stream going down right now and we’re pushing it as long as you can take us! Twitch.tv/kindafunnygames
On top of that, a new Xcast is up with Parris, Gary, and Mike all on the same set for the first time ever! It’s your Starfield questions answered.
A new PS I Love You XOXO is also up and it’s Greg and Bless talking about PS Plus, PlayStation Portal, and justifying your crazy PS5 purchasing decisions.
The Roper Report   -
00:11:00 - Starfield hit over 230,000 concurrent players in its first two hours on Steam
00:27:57 - Embracer has made layoffs at Gearbox Publishing
00:34:04 - A New Rugrats game is coming to NES
00:39:11 - New PlayStation Stars collectible just dropped!
00:45:27 - There's a Back to the Future DLC coming to PowerWash Simulator
00:47:07 - We’ve got a couple of Devolver release dates!
00:48:32 - Out Today
00:50:43 - You‘re Wrong
Tuesday’s Hosts: Greg & Bless

Epic Creator Code: KindaFunny
